title: Thunderbird
content: Hi, perhaps my problem is not that unusual, but I'm finding it a bit difficult to solve. I have three email accounts on Thunderbird, and all of them have exactly the same specifications. They are all @hotmail.com. They have the same server name (outlook.office365.com), same port number, same connection security, same authentication method (0Auth2) and same Imap default release code. Never had a problem. Then on July 10th just one of them stopped opening and a message window appeared saying that authentication was OK but it wasn't able to connect. The other two continue to open as before. Any idea on how to rectify this, please.

title: Phone Number Not Displaying on Google Maps – Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi
content:
Dear Google Support Team,

I am writing to report an issue regarding my business listing for Rama Rehab (website: https://www.ramarehab.com). Despite being listed as a Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi, my official contact phone number is currently not appearing on Google Maps.

This issue is impacting our ability to serve patients and families seeking reliable rehabilitation services in Delhi. Many individuals rely on our contact details to reach out for help, and the absence of our phone number is causing serious inconvenience.

Please look into this matter as soon as possible and help in updating or restoring our correct contact number on Google Maps.

Thank you for your support and cooperation.

Best regards, Rama Rehab Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi Website: https://www.ramarehab.com

Dear Google Business Support Team,

I am writing to report an issue regarding my business listing for Rama Rehab, a trusted Nasha Mukti Kendra in Delhi, with the official website https://www.ramarehab.com.

Currently, our business phone number is not visible on Google Maps, which is severely affecting our ability to connect with people who are seeking urgent help for addiction recovery. Our center provides critical de-addiction services, and it is essential that those in need can easily reach us through our contact number.

I kindly request your team to review and resolve this issue as soon as possible by displaying our correct phone number on our Google Maps listing.

Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Best regards, Rama Rehab Nasha Mukti Kendra in Delhi Website: https://www.ramarehab.com

title: Come scaricare con Thunderbird da casella PEC Altapec le PEC inviate e le bozze.
content: Buonasera. Premesso che: 1) ho installato Thunderbird come client ed ho impostato il protocollo POP3 e gli altri parametri ad esso associati come indicato da Altapec, poiché intendevo soltanto scaricare le PEC in arrivo, inviate e le bozze e salvarle sul mio computer in modo permanente e poi eliminarle definitivamente dalla mia casella Altapec per liberare spazio; 2) sono riuscito a scaricare, purtroppo, solo le PEC in arrivo; 3) non intendo sincronizzazione più dispositivi per leggere le PEC nella mia casella, chiedo cortesemente, se ne siete a conoscenza, di comunicarmi la procedura per scaricare dalla suddetta casella PEC ed archiviare sul mio PC pure le PEC inviate e le bozze. Inoltre, se questa operazione è possibile, domando se dopo aver scaricato ed archiviato le PEC inviate e le bozze, posso cancellarle definitivamente dalla casella Altapec. Infine, gradirei sapere, nel caso Thunderbird non consentisse l'operazione di cui sopra, se esistono altri programmi che lo consentono. Ringrazio anticipatamente. Cordiali saluti Renato Pascariello

title: using base Thunderbird, custom gmail calendar event reminders cannot be dismissed
content: I set up some custom (number of days in advance) calendar event reminders of my travel plans in my Google calendar via my cell phone. (looking at the details of the reminder it shows: "You have accepted this invitation.") I returned home from my trip and have several old flight reminders popping up in my pop-up box in thunderbird. I can try to dismiss them, by clicking on the dismiss button, but nothing happens. They do not disappear. But recurring birthday events from my google calendar, which are also in my T-bird calendar, are able to be dismissed from the T-bird Reminder pop-up box. A new event I created today in google calendar, flowed into T-bird with two custom reminders, but no event invite. (Is the issue with accepting invites?) I have tried unsubscribing and re-adding my google calendar, to no avail. I have tried to clear the T-bird startup cache, both with and without being subscribed to my google calendar, to no avail. Any help is appreciated by this confused user, thank you in advance.

title: Quota warning that the allowed 10.0 GB is full.
content: For quite some time now, I have been getting a Quota Warning that I was nearing my 10.0 GB limit. Now the program shows that the 10.0 GB limit has been reached, I eliminated a large amount of my emails recently but that action did not make any difference in the Quota Warnings. I was still able to send and receive mail, so I put the Quota Warning into a filter that would automatically send it to the trash folder. Now, after apparently reaching the full 10.0 GB limit, I have lost a vast number of emails I had in various folders. So, I downloaded and installed your newest version and hoped that the problem was solved. I still got the red percentage bar in the lower right hand corner of the pane, indicating the 10.0 GB limit had been reached. So, I went into my Inbox and deleted about 150 messages in there. Now the red warning is not showing in the lower right corner. Was my deletion of the messages in my Inbox effective in affecting this change? Why were my other archived and stored email messages deleted? The fact that they are gone did not, apparently have any bearing on the 10.0 GB limitation. Only the volume of messages in the Inbox has any bearing upon the limitation. Is the IMAP selection rather than the POP3 selection in the settings the place where the 10.0 GB limitation can be eliminated? It would be nice to know the answers to these questions along with a little explanation about why the limitation warning is so vague. Losing mail that you have tried to segregate and preserve is disturbing. Just trying to be nice. I hope you will be too.
creator: priceind

title: Thunderbird does not actually download email until email is opened
content:
I have an organizational Microsoft Exchange account that I will shortly lose access to so am trying to archive all my email & attachments from it. For this purpose I installed Thunderbird & connected it to the account using exchange sync. I followed every method I could to try to get Thunderbird to download all the mail, such as selecting each folder as download for offline use. The folders appear populated by email messages. Despite this, when I simulate going offline by cutting the computer's wi-fi connection, Thunderbird is unable to actually open any of the "downloaded" mail. Instead, it shows a blank screen and cycles with the "loading" message in the bottom left corner. Only emails I had previously actually opened will load properly when offline.

The Microsoft Exchange account says that the account takes around 9 GB of storage with attachments. The local Thunderbird folder is only a few MB in size. How can I ensure Thunderbird *actually* downloads the mail and all its attachments so they will be available for offline use or equivalently, available when I lose connection to the mail account? Thank you.
creator: ahelwer

title: Please bring back xPunge
content: I just want to put in a request to correct whatever code issues that stopped the plugin xPunge from working starting with TB 140.0.1. title: Login to server outbound.att.net with username (my email address) failed.  I have three choices:  Retry, Enter New Password,Cancel.  I could no longer receive emails after 9:00 a.m. today, July 24, 2025.
content: When I try to get new messages, I receive the following: Login to server outbound.att.net with username (my email address) failed. It shows three choices: Retry, Enter New Password, Cancel. I have tried entering my password and I get nothing except the above error message again. Before 9:00 a.m., this morning 07/24/2025 I was receving emails just fine. I could no longer receive emails after approx 9:00 a.m. today, July 24, 2025, and gave me the error message. Luckily, I can get emails on my phone. (I do not have Thunderbird on my phone).
creator: deb.mcb

title: Can’t delete some messages after installing Thunderbird 140
content:
I installed Thunderbird 140 today and I have discovered that I can’t delete some messages, while deleting others are completely unaffected. There’s nothing special about these particular emails, but no matter what I do, it just will not delete.

This is not normal and never happened before the update, so what can I do to solve this problem?
creator: Mulder
